tool_description: Records, categorizes, and tracks temperature compliance violations with corrective actions and follow-up status.

violation_source.description: How violation was detected: automated_alert, manual_inspection, audit_finding, customer_complaint

violation_category.description: Type of violation: temperature_abuse, time_limit_exceeded, documentation_missing, equipment_malfunction

severity_assessment.description: Risk level: minor, moderate, major, critical

responsible_person.description: Staff member responsible for corrective action

error_messages: Invalid violation_source: Must be one of [automated_alert, manual_inspection, audit_finding, customer_complaint].
Invalid location_id: Location identifier must be non-empty alphanumeric string.
Invalid violation_category: Must be one of [temperature_abuse, time_limit_exceeded, documentation_missing, equipment_malfunction].
Invalid severity_assessment: Must be one of [minor, moderate, major, critical].
Empty corrective_action: Corrective action description cannot be empty.
Duplicate violation: Same violation already recorded for this location and time period.
usage: Record each violation by specifying violation_source, location_id, violation_category, and severity_assessment. Describe corrective_action taken and optionally identify responsible_person.

violation_id.description: Unique identifier for this violation record

creation_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when violation was recorded

follow_up_required.description: Whether additional follow-up actions are needed

regulatory_reportable.description: Whether violation must be reported to regulatory authorities
